headline: React
subhead: React allows developers to create large web-applications that use data and can change over time without reloading the page.
abstract: React allows developers to create large web-applications that use data and can change over time without reloading the page.

headline: New Relic
subhead: New Relic monitors Web and mobile applications in real-time with support for custom-built plugins to collect arbitrary data.
abstract: New Relic monitors Web and mobile applications in real-time with support for custom-built plugins to collect arbitrary data.

headline: Amazon Web Services
subhead: Amazon Web Services provides on-demand cloud computing platforms such as S3 and Cloudfront Distributions.
abstract: Amazon Web Services provides on-demand cloud computing platforms such as S3 and Cloudfront Distributions.
